2 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web Hair Will Grow Back! No Matter How Severe The Baldness HaloGrow 0care 3 points 2 hours ago I would have thought he would want Bibi replaced after the fighting stopped?  I wonder what else they are working on permalink award report block reply Antenna OP 3 points 3 hours ago Is this is real? Asked Grok: Yes, it's real. President Trump sent a letter to Israeli President Isaac Herzog today, urging a full pardon for Benjamin Netanyahu and describing the corruption case against him as a politically motivated prosecution. The letter, released via Herzog's office, praises Netanyahu's leadership against Iran and in wartime, as confirmed by multiple outlets including BBC, CNN, and Jerusalem Post. permalink award report block reply
0care 3 points 2 hours ago I would have thought he would want Bibi replaced after the fighting stopped?  I wonder what else they are working on permalink award report block reply
Antenna OP 3 points 3 hours ago Is this is real? Asked Grok: Yes, it's real. President Trump sent a letter to Israeli President Isaac Herzog today, urging a full pardon for Benjamin Netanyahu and describing the corruption case against him as a politically motivated prosecution. The letter, released via Herzog's office, praises Netanyahu's leadership against Iran and in wartime, as confirmed by multiple outlets including BBC, CNN, and Jerusalem Post. permalink award report block reply
